column4: running command echo $DISPLAY gives me a blank line does that mean i can't forward X applications?
lstarnes: yeah I did the -X command still not sure why I got no display or how to fix it
do you have installed the required binaries on the server?
what are the required binaries other than openssh-server
I was told I didnt need to actually have x on the host machine which is something im trying to avoid due to is large dependencies and components
you don't need X, but you need some required libraries
try installing the xauth package on the server
and that will pull with it x11-common, i believe
actually it doesnt but it is installed will try now
kevdog: it works now xauth did the trick had to install dbus-x11 but yeah working now thanks
